snippet.title: FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE Trailer for FFVII - A Symphonic Reunion (Closed Captions)
snippet.description:
Check out the surprise trailer that was revealed to a live audience during FINAL FANTASY VII - A Symphonic Reunion, the first concert dedicated entirely to FINAL FANTASY VII. 
 
FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE is a reimagining of the iconic original with unforgettable characters, a mind-blowing story, and epic battles.

The story of this first, standalone game in the FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE project covers up to the party’s escape from Midgar, and goes deeper into the events occurring in Midgar than the original FINAL FANTASY VII.

Looking for more exciting FINAL FANTASY REMAKE VII reveals? Then be sure to follow us:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/FinalFantasyVII
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FinalFantasyVII
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/FinalFantasyVII
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/FinalFantasy 
#FinalFantasy #FF7R
